verses.text: \w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w ungodly|strong="H7563"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* chair \w of|strong="H0376"\w* pestilence.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w meditate|strong="H1897"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6086"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w planted|strong="H8362"\w* \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w running|strong="H1961"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w due|strong="H5921"\w* \w season|strong="H6256"\w*. \w And|strong="H6086"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaf|strong="H5929"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fall|strong="H1961"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*.

\w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* dust, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* driveth \w from|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* face \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* earth.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H5712"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w again|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* council \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w just|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* knoweth \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.
